name: Undarkened Survival
description:
Undarkened is a PvE/PvP magic survival game, where you can hunt, explore, craft and more!

Features:

  • Host a multiplayer game (Or play alone)
  • Build a base and store your items
  • Research Magical spells
  • Discover ancient and legendary artifacts and weapons
  • Craft tools and weapons
  • Explore the massive world
  • Hunt corrupt enemies
  • Fight other players
  • Harvest resources
